message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be a great fit for you, given your needs. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I understand your position, Bob, but $9,800 is quite a bit lower than I'm comfortable with.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,900?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. How about we try $10,200?
